text: Kinnam Katta Kallan is a 1996 Indian Malayalam film, directed by K. K. Haridas and starring Sreenivasan and Jagadish in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Sreenivasan as Const. Bhaskaran * Jagadish as SI Bhagyanathan * Mala Aravindan as Const. Mathew Joseph * Jagathy Sreekumar as Kammaran * Harishree Ashokan as Eenashu * Indrans as Kochappi * Innocent as Exp. MP P.V.C * Rajan P Dev as Dr. Raghavan * Devayani_(actress) as Anju Raghavan * Kanakalatha * Mansoor Ali Khan as Bindran Billa * Spadikam George ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by K. K. Haridas
title: Kinnam Katta Kallan
